test.name: ApplyDirectStylingMergeParagraph_MergeWithinStyling
test.comment: Due to #551, the DOMs do not converge even though they will visually render ok

test.name: InsertTextSplitParagraph_InsertBeforeSplit
test.comment: Insert text between split position and paragraph start position

test.name: InsertTextSplitParagraph_InsertInParagraphBeforeSplit
test.comment: Insert text in paragraph before split the paragraph to be split

test.name: MergeParagraphSplitParagraph_EmptyParagraph
test.comment: Merge into an empty paragraph that is being split. Ensure consistent styles result

test.name: MergeParagraphSplitParagraph_MergeSplit
test.comment: Merge then split the same paragraph on two clients

test.name: SetParagraphStyleSplitParagraph_[a]_A|B
test.comment: SetParagraphStyle occurs before paragraph impacted by split

test.name: SetParagraphStyleSplitParagraph_A|B_[]
test.comment: SetParagraphStyle occurs after paragraph impacted by split

test.name: SetParagraphStyleSplitParagraph_[A|B]
test.comment: SetParagraphStyle encompasses a paragraph that is being split

test.name: AddAnnotationAddAnnotation_{_}[_]
test.comment: Order of office:annotation and office:annotation-end at same position not defined

test.name: AddAnnotationAddAnnotation_{_[_}]
test.comment: Order of multiple office:annotation-end at same position not defined

test.name: AddAnnotationAddAnnotation_{}[_]
test.comment: Order of office:annotation and office:annotation-end at same position not defined

test.name: AddAnnotationAddAnnotation_{[_]}
test.comment: Order of multiple office:annotation-end at same position not defined

test.name: AddAnnotationApplyDirectStyling_{_[_}]_
test.comment: fails, because the order of office:annotation-end and /text:span is random, needs to be defined

test.name: AddAnnotationApplyDirectStyling_[{_}]_
test.comment: fails, because the order of office:annotation-end and /text:span is random, needs to be defined

test.name: AddAnnotationApplyDirectStyling_[_{__}]
test.comment: fails, because the order of office:annotation-end and /text:span is random, needs to be defined
